resources:
Afya_App
//Acetaminophen Acetaminophen
Acetaminophen is commonly used medication that is primarily used to relieve pain and reduce fever.
 It is classified as an analgesic (pain reliever) and antipyretic (fever reducer).
 Acetaminophen is often used to alleviate mild to moderate pain associated with conditions such as headaches, muscle aches, toothaches, menstrual cramps, and osteoarthritis. 4.00 ksh for 1 pill
GoodLife Pharmacy Soham 
 Mombasa Road, Nairobi 
 Hours: 
 Monday 8:30am–9pm 
 Tuesday 8:30am–9pm 
 Wednesday 8:30am–9pm 
 Thursday 8:30am–9pm 
 Friday 8:30am–9pm 
 Saturday 8:30am–9pm 
 Sunday 9am–8pm 
 Phone:0704 567395
Amoxicillin
Amoxicillin is an antibiotic medication used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections.
It belongs to the penicillin group of antibiotics and works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
Amoxicillin is commonly used to treat infections of the respiratory tract, ear, nose, throat, urinary tract, and skin. 
6.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharma Health
Kenyatta Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 9am–8pm
Tuesday 9am–8pm
Wednesday 9am–8pm
Thursday 9am–8pm
Friday 9am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0703 987654
Atorvastatin
Atorvastatin is a medication used to lower cholesterol levels and prevent cardiovascular disease.
It belongs to a group of drugs called statins and works by blocking an enzyme that produces cholesterol in the liver.
Atorvastatin is commonly prescribed to reduce LDL cholesterol and triglycerides and increase HDL cholesterol. 
10.00 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharmnet Pharmacy
Moi Avenue, Nairobi

Sunday 9am–6pm
Phone:0712 345678
Azithromycin
Azithromycin is an antibiotic medication used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.
It belongs to the macrolide antibiotic class and works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
Azithromycin is commonly used to treat respiratory tract infections, skin infections, ear infections, and sexually transmitted diseases. 
8.00 ksh for 1 pill 
Mediplus Pharmacy
Koinange Street, Nairobi
Hours:

Tuesday 8:30am–9pm
Wednesday 8:30am–9pm
Thursday 8:30am–9pm

Ciprofloxacin
Ciprofloxacin is an antibiotic medication used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections.
It belongs to the fluoroquinolone antibiotic class and works by stopping the growth of bacteria.
Ciprofloxacin is commonly used to treat urinary tract infections, respiratory tract infections, skin infections, and gastrointestinal infections. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Wellness Pharmacy
Tom Mboya Street, Nairobi
Hours:

Thursday 8am–8pm

Escitalopram
Escitalopram is an antidepressant medication used to treat depression and anxiety disorders.
It belongs to the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) class of drugs and works by increasing the levels of serotonin in the brain.
Escitalopram is commonly prescribed to improve mood, energy levels, and feelings of well-being. 
12.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharmalink Chemists
Harambee Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–8pm
Tuesday 8:30am–8pm
Wednesday 8:30am–8pm
Thursday 8:30am–8pm
Friday 8:30am–8pm
Saturday 8:30am–8pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0765 123456
Ibuprofen
Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.
It works by inhibiting the production of certain chemicals in the body that cause pain and inflammation.
Ibuprofen is commonly used to treat headaches, muscle aches, dental pain, menstrual cramps, and arthritis. 
5.00 ksh for 1 pill 
Mediworld Pharmacy
Mama Ngina Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 9am–9pm
Tuesday 9am–9pm
Wednesday 9am–9pm
Thursday 9am–9pm
Friday 9am–9pm
Saturday 9am–9pm
Sunday 10am–8pm
Phone:0722 345678
Lisinopril
Lisinopril is an angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.
It works by relaxing blood vessels and reducing the workload on the heart.
Lisinopril is commonly prescribed to improve blood flow and lower blood pressure. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Medlife Pharmacy
Moi Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–8pm
Tuesday 8:30am–8pm
Wednesday 8:30am–8pm
Thursday 8:30am–8pm
Friday 8:30am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0732 345678
Metformin
Metformin is an oral antidiabetic medication used to control blood sugar levels in individuals with type 2 diabetes.
It works by reducing the production of glucose in the liver and improving the sensitivity of body tissues to insulin.
Metformin is commonly prescribed as part of a comprehensive treatment plan for diabetes. 
3.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharma World

Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed

Omeprazole
Omeprazole is a proton pump inhibitor (PPI) used to reduce stomach acid production and treat conditions such as acid reflux, ulcers, and gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD).
It works by blocking the enzyme in the stomach that produces acid.
Omeprazole is commonly prescribed to relieve symptoms of heartburn, regurgitation, and stomach pain. 
6.00 ksh for 1 pill 
Medcare Pharmacy
Mombasa Road, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–9pm
Tuesday 8:30am–9pm
Wednesday 8:30am–9pm
Thursday 8:30am–9pm
Friday 8:30am–9pm
Saturday 9am-6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0761 987655
Paroxetine
Paroxetine is an antidepressant medication used to treat depression, anxiety disorders, and obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
It belongs to the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) class of drugs and works by increasing the levels of serotonin in the brain.
Paroxetine is commonly prescribed to improve mood, sleep, and overall well-being. 
10.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharma Health

Hours:
Monday 9am–8pm
Tuesday 9am–8pm
Wednesday 9am–8pm
Thursday 9am–8pm
Friday 9am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm

Prednisone
Prednisone is a corticosteroid medication used to reduce inflammation and suppress the immune system.
It is commonly used to treat conditions such as allergies, asthma, arthritis, and autoimmune disorders.
Prednisone works by reducing the production of substances that cause inflammation in the body. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill

Simvastatin
Simvastatin is a medication used to lower cholesterol levels and prevent cardiovascular disease.
It belongs to a group of drugs called statins and works by blocking an enzyme that produces cholesterol in the liver.
Simvastatin is commonly prescribed to reduce LDL cholesterol and triglycerides and increase HDL cholesterol. 
9.00 ksh for 1 pill

Tadalafil
Tadalafil is a medication used to treat erectile dysfunction (ED) and symptoms of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).
It belongs to a class of drugs called phosphodiesterase type 5 (PDE5) inhibitors and works by increasing blood flow to the penis.
Tadalafil is commonly known by the brand name Cialis. 
15.00 ksh for 1 pill 
Wellness Pharmacy
Tom Mboya Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0734 567890
Tramadol
Tramadol is a pain medication used to treat moderate to moderately severe pain.
It belongs to the opioid class of drugs and works by binding to opioid receptors in the brain to block pain signals.
Tramadol is commonly prescribed for conditions such as post-operative pain, chronic pain, and fibromyalgia. 
8.50 ksh for 1 pill 
Pharmalink Chemists
Harambee Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–8pm
Tuesday 8:30am–8pm
Wednesday 8:30am–8pm
Thursday 8:30am–8pm
Friday 8:30am–8pm
Saturday 8:30am–8pm
Sunday 10am–6pm
Phone:0771 234567
Warfarin
Warfarin is an anticoagulant medication used to prevent blood clots from forming or growing larger in the blood vessels or heart.
It is commonly prescribed to treat conditions such as deep vein thrombosis (DVT), pulmonary embolism (PE), and atrial fibrillation.
Warfarin works by inhibiting the production of certain clotting factors in the liver. 
12.00 ksh for 1 pill 
MediLife Pharmacy
Mama Ngina Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0701 234567
Amlodipine
Amlodipine is a calcium channel blocker medication used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina).
It works by relaxing the blood vessels, allowing the heart to pump blood more easily and reducing the workload on the heart.
Amlodipine is commonly prescribed to improve blood flow and lower blood pressure. 
8.50 ksh for 1 pill 
PharmPlus Pharmacy
Uhuru Highway, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–9pm
Tuesday 8:30am–9pm
Wednesday 8:30am–9pm
Thursday 8:30am–9pm
Friday 8:30am–9pm
Saturday 9am–8pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0710 345678
Clonazepam
Clonazepam is a medication used to treat seizures, panic disorder, and certain anxiety disorders.
It belongs to a class of drugs called benzodiazepines and works by enhancing the activity of a neurotransmitter in the brain that reduces excessive brain activity.
Clonazepam is commonly prescribed to control seizures and reduce anxiety symptoms. 
6.00 ksh for 1 pill 
HealthLink Pharmacy

Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0722 567890
Fluoxetine
Fluoxetine is an antidepressant medication used to treat major depressive disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), bulimia nervosa, and panic disorder.
It belongs to a class of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) and works by increasing the levels of serotonin, a neurotransmitter, in the brain.
Fluoxetine is commonly prescribed to improve mood and reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill 
MediPharm Chemist
Tom Mboya Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0733 678901
Lorazepam
Lorazepam is a medication used to treat anxiety disorders, insomnia, and seizures.
It belongs to a class of drugs called benzodiazepines and works by enhancing the activity of a neurotransmitter in the brain that reduces excessive brain activity.
Lorazepam is commonly prescribed to reduce anxiety symptoms and induce sedation. 
6.00 ksh for 1 pill 
MediLife Pharmacy
Mama Ngina Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0701 234567
Oxycodone
Oxycodone is a potent opioid medication used to treat moderate to severe pain.
It works by binding to opioid receptors in the brain and spinal cord, reducing the transmission of pain signals.
Oxycodone is commonly prescribed for pain management, particularly after surgery or injury. 
14.50 ksh for 1 pill 
PharmPlus Pharmacy
Uhuru Highway, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8:30am–9pm
Tuesday 8:30am–9pm
Wednesday 8:30am–9pm
Thursday 8:30am–9pm
Friday 8:30am–9pm
Saturday 9am–8pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0710 345678
Pregabalin
Pregabalin is a medication used to treat neuropathic pain, epilepsy, and generalized anxiety disorder.
It works by reducing the release of certain neurotransmitters in the brain that are involved in transmitting pain signals and promoting excessive brain activity.
Pregabalin is commonly prescribed to manage chronic pain and control seizures. 
9.00 ksh for 1 pill 
HealthLink Pharmacy
Kenyatta Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0722 567890
Sildenafil
Sildenafil is a medication used to treat erectile dysfunction (ED) and pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH).
It works by increasing blood flow to the penis during sexual stimulation, allowing for an erection, and relaxing the blood vessels in the lungs, reducing the workload on the heart.
Sildenafil is commonly prescribed to improve sexual function and treat PAH. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill 
MediPharm Chemist
Tom Mboya Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0733 678901
Tamsulosin
Tamsulosin is a medication used to treat symptoms of an enlarged prostate (benign prostatic hyperplasia or BPH).
It works by relaxing the muscles in the prostate and bladder, allowing for better urine flow and reducing urinary symptoms.
Tamsulosin is commonly prescribed to improve urinary function in men with BPH. 
8.00 ksh for 1 pill 
MediLife Pharmacy
Mama Ngina Street, Nairobi

Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm

Saturday 9am–6pm

Zolpidem
Zolpidem is a medication used to treat insomnia and sleep disorders.
It works by increasing the activity of a neurotransmitter in the brain that promotes sleep.
Zolpidem is commonly prescribed for short-term use to help with sleep initiation and maintenance. 
10.50 ksh for 1 pill 
PharmPlus Pharmacy
Uhuru Highway, Nairobi
Hours:

Tuesday 8:30am–9pm
Wednesday 8:30am–9pm

Bupropion
Bupropion is a medication used to treat depression and to aid in smoking cessation.
It works by increasing the levels of certain neurotransmitters in the brain that are involved in mood regulation and reducing nicotine cravings.
Bupropion is commonly prescribed as an antidepressant and to help people quit smoking. 
7.00 ksh for 1 pill 
HealthLink Pharmacy
Kenyatta Avenue, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0722 567890
Doxycycline
Doxycycline is an antibiotic medication used to treat various bacterial infections.
It works by inhibiting the growth of bacteria and preventing the spread of infection.
Doxycycline is commonly prescribed to treat respiratory infections, skin infections, and certain sexually transmitted diseases. 
5.50 ksh for 1 pill 
MediPharm Chemist

Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed

Gabapentin
Gabapentin is a medication used to treat seizures, nerve pain, and restless legs syndrome.
It works by reducing the abnormal electrical activity in the brain and altering the way nerves send pain signals.
Gabapentin is commonly prescribed as an anticonvulsant and to relieve neuropathic pain. 
9.50 ksh for 1 pill 
MediLife Pharmacy
Mama Ngina Street, Nairobi
Hours:
Monday 8am–8pm
Tuesday 8am–8pm
Wednesday 8am–8pm
Thursday 8am–8pm
Friday 8am–8pm
Saturday 9am–6pm
Sunday Closed
Phone:0701 234567
Losartan
Losartan is a medication used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) and to protect the kidneys in people with diabetes.
It works by blocking the action of certain chemicals that tighten the blood vessels, allowing for better blood flow and reduced blood pressure.
Losartan is commonly prescribed to manage hypertension and diabetic kidney disease. 
6.00 ksh for 1 pill

Pantoprazole
Pantoprazole is a medication used to treat stomach and esophagus problems such as acid reflux, ulcers, and gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD).
It works by reducing the amount of acid produced in the stomach.
Pantoprazole is commonly prescribed to relieve symptoms and promote healing of these conditions. 
4.50 ksh for 1 pill

Propranolol
Propranolol is a medication used to treat high blood pressure, angina, and certain heart rhythm disorders.
It works by blocking the action of certain chemicals that affect the heart and blood vessels.
Propranolol is commonly prescribed to manage hypertension and control heart-related conditions. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill

Carvedilol
Carvedilol is a medication used to treat heart failure and high blood pressure.
It works by blocking certain receptors in the heart and blood vessels, reducing the workload on the heart and improving blood flow.
Carvedilol is commonly prescribed to manage heart failure and hypertension. 
8.50 ksh for 1 pill

Esomeprazole
Esomeprazole is a medication used to treat stomach and esophagus problems such as acid reflux, ulcers, and gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD).
It works by reducing the amount of acid produced in the stomach.
Esomeprazole is commonly prescribed to relieve symptoms and promote healing of these conditions.

Hydroxyzine
Hydroxyzine is a medication used to treat anxiety, itching, and allergies.
It works by blocking certain chemicals in the body that cause allergic reactions and anxiety symptoms.
Hydroxyzine is commonly prescribed as an antihistamine and for the short-term management of anxiety. 
4.00 ksh for 1 pill

Meloxicam
Meloxicam is a medication used to treat pain and inflammation caused by arthritis.
It works by reducing the production of certain chemicals in the body that cause pain and inflammation.
Meloxicam is commonly prescribed as a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for arthritis pain relief. 
7.50 ksh for 1 pill

Methotrexate
Methotrexate is a medication used in chemotherapy to treat various cancers, including breast, lung, and certain types of leukemia.
It works by interfering with the growth and division of cancer cells.
Methotrexate is commonly prescribed as part of a cancer treatment regimen. 
18.00 ksh for 1 vial
